ygData.subject: Re: Crazy + Brewing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I think if u sell at DE city, u can buy low sell high, mainly becoz ya evil char is a hero in their eyes. High INT does help to gain skills faster, that
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I think if u sell at DE city, u can buy low sell high, mainly becoz ya
evil char is a hero in their eyes.

High INT does help to gain skills faster, that why stupid goon like troll
and ogre take long time to max their skills to lvl ceiling, esp at high
lvl.

U can also buy CHA jewelry to boost ya CHA when u buy and sell stuffs.

Backing to brewing, yes, I buy 160 sets of each reagents. One slot can
take 20 sets, 8 slots can take 160 sets. I remember that time I filled 5
backpack full, so it shld be 200 sets instead, hehe. I use the ctrl-click
method, but still brewing until vomit blood. No more brewing for me after
tat until now, hehe.

As for skill gaining, as long as u r fighting mobs which u can get xp after
killing it (some green mobs also give xp), u will gain skill points.

I think brewing is quite a nice source of money for lvl 1-20. Now it's
still giving me a faster and better return rate. I wonder if there is
higher range of brews which we can make to further increase our skills.
Dunno where to find those brewing book, anyone got any idea? Of coz if u
are looking for cool stuffs like FBR, u need to brew alot to afford it
still.


Zil

On Thursday, 08 July, 1999 12:15 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> well... from all the necro guides n stuff... i have decided to pump up my
> INT to 120 and DEX to 100... i dont know if this enough... but i suppose
it
> will be... since a Human Necro will have much lesser INT and will also be
> able to manage... i guess the main reason fer using more pp to max out
> brewing is not bcos of low INT... its bcos of LOW CHARISMA.... thats
very
> impt... i thnk... i spend more gold getting the stuff... n sell back fer
> less... thats the way it is... definetely cant compare to a high chr bard
> rite?
>
> also... another thing i noticed... fighting a mob that u got upper hand
> on... will also gain skill in fighting (proven)... i guess u just need to
> fight alot... thats all.... since i gain 1 point when fighting a level 1
mob
> when i was level 4...
>
> back to brewing... u buy 160 sets of everything??!!?!?!?! 7 backpacks
> enough meh? might teaching me some tricks to brewing?.... like the ctrl +
> click thingy someone said earlier (oops.. forgot who... but that really
> helps)...
>
> i guess i will not try to learn any other trade skills fer awhile...
least
> not till ive level to i think high enough... or perhaps abit of
everything
> every now n then....
>
> Nic
